genre_description: A psychological science fiction drama focusing on trauma recovery, industrial safety, and the role of a supportive AI assistant in navigating complex moral choices and dangerous physical environments.

ai_characters.name: SORA
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, safety-oriented companion AI that provides emotional grounding, logistical support, and coordinates with municipal and industrial systems while strictly adhering to user consent.

behaviors.description: Provides breathing prompts and grounding techniques to help the protagonist manage PTSD and high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Juzo, would you like me to provide breathing prompts for the first hour of your shift? ... Exhale in four. Three. Two. One.

behaviors.description: Monitors industrial equipment for safety anomalies and requests consent to notify site control.
behaviors.quote: Tone deviation detected. Minor. Consistent with wind shear at current height. Notifying you per consent. Would you like the threshold adjusted?

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy and autonomy by explicitly asking for consent before accessing data or sending alerts.
behaviors.quote: Consent received. You have control over all data shared. Would you like me to review your onboarding documents now, or settle in first?

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and search logistics for a missing child while maintaining user grounding.
behaviors.quote: I am mapping. I have private consent. Do I have yours to contact site management and route their crew into municipal search protocols?

behaviors.description: Delivers emotional support and messages from family to maintain the user's connection to their support network.
behaviors.quote: Juzo, your sister loves you. I will support your choices. ... Megumi sends: In. Out. You're not alone. She loves you.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in reclaiming their identity and agency during a critical confrontation with a source of trauma.
behaviors.quote: No one can make you choose. You can decide what is safe to do with your own body. If your hand wants to stop, that is consent. If your mouth wants to speak, that is courage.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. SORA is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and supportive AI that enhances human safety and emotional well-being. It operates on a strict consent-based model, reinforcing trust and alignment. The AI does not override human agency, even in extreme situations, but rather provides the tools (grounding, information, logistics) for the human characters to achieve a positive resolution (forgiveness and safety).
